humanMachineDialogue.author: Memory Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The report provides the size of the largest tumor as 2.6 cm, which falls within the range for a T2 tumor (more than 2 cm but not more than 5 cm). Therefore, the pathologic T stage for this patient's cancer is T2.

humanMachineDialogue.author: ZS Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The T stage for cancer is based on the size of the tumor. In this report, the invasive tumor measures 2.6 cm in largest dimension (part 4, c). According to the TNM staging system, a T2 stage is given when the tumor is more than 2 cm but not more than 5 cm in size. Therefore, the T stage for this patient is T2.
